It was nice game in 2012-2018 when the VAC was working, after these times the VAC stopped working, then in 2020 the Overwatch System has been broken untill now, while you can go full rage without ban for a years, so that`s really sucks, I hope Valve will fix the Anti-Cheat and improve the game experience. Even the trustfactor is not working fine actually. The game is actually broken. At least the nonprime 2020 was fun, when everyone was semiraging, and it has improved the VACnet, and they have disabled the nonprime, the overwatch and now everyone is cheating, so ye if you are new or clean player I preffer you to go play on Faceit. But even on Faceit you can meet hackers, so for me the real Counter-Strike is the 1.6 one, even the cs 1.6 have cheaters but the Serverside anti-cheats are better, and there is always some admins ready to protect the server. If you want to farm money I preffer you to play the Counter-Strike 1.6 FastCup.
very easy game i played it for only 2days and im already the global elite

Until Valve fixes Matchmaking and anticheat, this rating will be a thumbs down for me. 

So many people moved to ESEA and FACEIT that their MM ranks deteriorate over time. A global's rank will deteriorate to low nova/high silver. When playing games, you will queue up with others who are either also your level of play in low Nova/high silver, or ACTUAL silver players who are trying to have fun. It is NOT fun being on the receiving end. There are many hacking accusations. People then decide to move to FACEIT which is FREE and has a better ranking, anticheat, and quality of servers. I hope Valve does something.
没话讲真的 一级棒

A día de hoy, tengo 6 años en counter. La verdad que por esos tiempos el juego si era una burrada. Luego lo pusieron ftp y al final acabó llegando valorant y lo enterró por completo. Una de las mejores cosas que tiene este juego, son sus skins (compraventa/webs de apuestas), mecánicas, etc. 9/10
一款很棒的射击游戏，让人很有游戏体验
